nodes.text: The Rising Prayer was a religious prayer that the Theelin pilot Chass na Chadic kept a habit of uttering, despite not believing in it. The day after the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Hellion's Dare, which Chadic was stationed on, was attacked above Jiruus and forced to flee, Chadic muttered it in one of the frigates showering stalls so that no one else could hear her, as she did not want to be questioned about the prayer.
The Rising Prayer was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, which was written by Alexander Freed.
